alert.note: Alert for Cloud; Ottawa; Republic (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 9:23PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ottawa, southeastern Republic and Cloud Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 922 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Aurora to near Wells to Bennington. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Concordia, Minneapolis, Clyde, Bennington, Miltonvale, Delphos, Tescott, Cuba, Culver, Wells, Agenda, Aurora, Niles and Ada. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central and north central Kansas.
